about_the_game:
Forbidden Sparks of Passion is an adult-only visual for adults! This fascinating story tells about a young man who fell in love with his neighbor and fucked her more than once! However, she had a husband who was extremely unhappy with what was happening.

Tom is an ordinary guy who goes to work and leads a normal life. One day, his neighbor turned to him for help, as her heating system did not work. Tom immediately knew that he wanted to win her heart and pussy. However, the neighbor had a husband who was extremely dissatisfied with their communication. But this did not stop Tom and he wanted to fuck her in full... What happened next you will see in the game.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
